abstract: A rights issue of more than $10 billion is one option for HSBC to remove uncertainty about its capital and allow it to take advantage of Asian deals, and investors may prefer the bank to act now, Reuters said.
lead_paragraph: A rights issue of more than $10 billion is one option for HSBC to remove uncertainty about its capital and allow it to take advantage of Asian deals, and investors may prefer the bank to act now, Reuters said.

headline.main: HSBC Could Benefit From Rights Issue
